00014 #include <QIcon>

00017 #include <QHeaderView>
00018 #include <QSharedPointer>
00019 #include <QAbstractItemDelegate>
00020 
00021 ConfigurableElementEditor::ConfigurableElementEditor(QWidget *parent,
00022                                                                                                          const QString& title):
00023 QGroupBox(title, parent),
00024 component_(0),
00025 view_(this),
00026 filter_(this),
00027 model_(this),
00028 addButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/add.png"), QString(), this),
00029 removeButton_(QIcon(":/icons/graphics/remove.png"), QString(), this) {
00030 
00031         filter_.setSourceModel(&model_);
00032         view_.setModel(&filter_);
00033 
00034         // set options for the view
00035         view_.horizontalHeader()->setStretchLastSection(true);
00036         view_.horizontalHeader()->setResizeMode(QHeaderView::Interactive);
00037         view_.setSelectionMode(QAbstractItemView::SingleSelection);
00038         view_.setSelectionBehavior(QAbstractItemView::SelectItems);
00039         view_.setEditTriggers(QAbstractItemView::DoubleClicked | 
00040                 QAbstractItemView::SelectedClicked | QAbstractItemView::EditKeyPressed);
00041         view_.setWordWrap(true);
00042         view_.setSortingEnabled(false);
00043         view_.verticalHeader()->hide();
00044         view_.setItemDelegate(new ConfigurableElementDelegate(QSharedPointer<Component>(), this));
00045         view_.setSortingEnabled(true);
00046 
00047         QHBoxLayout* buttonLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
00048         buttonLayout->addStretch();
00049         buttonLayout->addWidget(&addButton_);
00050         buttonLayout->addWidget(&removeButton_);
00051 
00052         QVBoxLayout* topLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00053         topLayout->addWidget(&view_);
00054         topLayout->addLayout(buttonLayout);
00055 
00056         connect(&addButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00057                 &model_, SLOT(onAdd()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00058         connect(&removeButton_, SIGNAL(clicked(bool)),
00059                 this, SLOT(onRemoveClick()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00060         connect(&model_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00061                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00062 }
00063 
00064 ConfigurableElementEditor::~ConfigurableElementEditor() {
00065 }
00066 
00067 void ConfigurableElementEditor::setComponent( ComponentItem* component ) {
00068 
00069         // set the component for the item delegate.
00070         QAbstractItemDelegate* absDelegate = view_.itemDelegate();
00071         ConfigurableElementDelegate* delegate = qobject_cast<ConfigurableElementDelegate*>(absDelegate);
00072         Q_ASSERT(delegate);
00073         delegate->setComponent(component->componentModel());
00074 
00075         component_ = component;
00076         model_.setComponent(component);
00077 }
00078 
00079 void ConfigurableElementEditor::clear() {
00080 
00081         component_ = 0;
00082         model_.clear();
00083 }
00084 
00085 void ConfigurableElementEditor::onRemoveClick() {
00086         QModelIndex index = view_.currentIndex();
00087         QModelIndex sourceIndex = filter_.mapToSource(index);
00088         if (sourceIndex.isValid())
00089                 model_.onRemove(sourceIndex);
00090 }
